summary: A Doomguide one handed bastard sword.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Do not re upload anywhere, in original or modified formats.

[/b]Touch of Death is a one handed bastard sword which was made for a doomguide, acolyte of Kelemvor. ( D&D terms )
Basically it would be a weapon of Meridia, designed to slay undead. ( TES terms )

It is based on http://auriv1.deviantart.com/art/Concept-Touch-of-Death-424935029

The weapon can be crafted and is listed under the MISC section. This is due to it having silver properties instead of iron or steel.
author: Mr Dave
